title: Sparks: Conflicts of interest
description: The Sparks crew discusses how politicians and scientists wrestle with conflicts of interest, and what the science says about how conflict of interest can change our decisions.

itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, ESPN, Jody Avirgan
